#summary How to compile HeeksCAD and HeeksCNC on Debian

This is mainly for people who want to edit the source code and test the software frequently, which means make install will not be used.

If you want to use make install, remove 'RUNINPLACE=yes' and run make install after every 'make', and ignore the ln -s .so commands. Or something like that. You should also check http://code.google.com/p/heekscad/wiki/CompilingForUbuntu



Copy paste this into your nearest terminal:
{{{
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y subversion libopencascade-dev libwxgtk2.8-dev libgtkglext1-dev python2.5-dev 
#press enter
svn checkout http://heekscad.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ heekscad
cd heekscad/src/
RUNINPLACE=yes make
}}}

Wait a few minutes.


to add CAM capability (HeeksCNC plugin):
{{{
cd ..
svn checkout http://heekscnc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ heekscnc
cd heekscnc
mkdir -p PyCam/trunk
svn co https://pycam.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/pycam/trunk/pycam PyCam/trunk/pycam
cd src
RUNINPLACE=yes make
cd ../kurve
make
cd ..
cp kurve/.libs/kurve.so .
}}}

You probably will want to continue by building libarea and libactp for HeeksCNC

{{{
cd ../../
svn checkout http://libarea.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ libarea
cd libarea
make
cp .libs/area.so ../heekscad/heekscnc/area.so
}}}

{{{
cd ../
svn checkout http://libactp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ libactp
cd libactp/PythonLib
make
cp .libs/actp.so ../../heekscad/heekscnc/actp.so
}}}

Then run HeeksCAD and add the HeeksCNC plugin (if you built it)

HeeksCNC won't work without PYTHONPATH="/your/absolute/path/to/heekscad/heekscnc/" because without it, it isn't able to find the area.so etc python modules.

Another way of making it find them is copying (or linking) kurve.so, area.so and actp.so to /usr/local/lib/python-(version)/site-packages/ instead of heekscad/

{{{
cd ../../heekscad/
PYTHONPATH="/your/absolute/path/to/heekscad/heekscnc/" ./HeeksCAD
}}}

You could also make a small script for starting HeeksCAD:
{{{
echo -e '#!/bin/sh\nPYTHONPATH="/your/path/to/heekscad/heekscnc" `dirname $0`/HeeksCAD' > startcad.sh
chmod +x startcad.sh
./startcad.sh
}}}

Now do File->Plugins and click "..." and find libheekscnc.so.0.5.1 under heekscnc/

Restart HeeksCAD to load the plugin.
